synopsis.text: Shuichi's life in the quaint Japanese coastal town of Kurouzu-cho takes a bizarre turn as the town's residents, including his own father, become inexplicably captivated by spiral patterns. When these peculiar fixations escalate into terrifying and inexplicable events, Shuichi and his girlfriend Kirie Goshima find themselves entangled in a vortex of chaos. As the spiral motif manifests itself in increasingly sinister ways, the town's inhabitants spiral into madness. With no escape in sight, the couple must confront the enigmatic force known as Uzumaki, the spiral - a hypnotic secret shape that has the power to warp their world beyond recognition. Based on Junji Ito's manga, this four-episode anime adaptation promises a gripping descent into the unknown.
